title: Broccoli & Asparagus Sweet potato with Chickpeas with Chickpeas & Potato
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Heat tahini in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Cook chickpeas 6–8 min until done; remove.
Stir-fry broccoli and asparagus with smoked paprika + cumin 34 min; season.
Return protein to warm through 1–2 min.
Cook sweet potato until tender (20–25 min boiled).
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Sweet potato or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Baby potatoes or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Peppers & Garlic Sweet potato with Pork tenderloin with Pork & Potato
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Toss peppers and garlic with half the tahini, salt, pepper and italian herbs; spread on a tray.
Season pork tenderloin and place on the tray. Roast for 45 min, turning once.
Cook sweet potato until tender (18–25 min roasted).
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Swap Pork for tofu to make it vegetarian.
Use Sweet potato or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Chickpeas Cajun blend bowl with Chickpeas & Potato
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Prepare the fresh components on a board.
Mix chickpeas with cajun blend and a pinch of salt.
Layer with onion, garlic and sweet potato.
Cook sweet potato until tender (20–25 min boiled).
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
